49 namespace occupancy_map_monitor

51 class PointCloudOctomapUpdater : public OccupancyMapUpdater
52 {

56

68

94 
95  /* used to store all cells in the map which a given ray passes through during raycasting.
96  we cache this here because it dynamically pre-allocates a lot of memory in its contsructor */
97  octomap::KeyRay key_ray_;
98 
99  std::unique_ptr<point_containment_filter::ShapeMask> shape_mask_;
